properties.entry: select r_no , u_no , u_id , u_nickname , u_pw , u_phone , reg_date , mod_date , u_status , r_dong , r_ho , r_name , r_email , r_type , r_status , r_date from member join info_resident using (R_NO) where u_id = ? and u_pw = ? and u_status = 'Y'
select M_NO , M_ID , M_PASSWORD , M_NAME , M_NICK , M_PHONE , M_JOBCODE from INFO_MANAGER where M_ID = ? and M_PASSWORD = ?
